âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Realtime translate â€¢ OCR (TesseractOCR, Windows OCR, NHOcr, Easy OCR) â€¢ Machine translation (Naver Papago, Google Web, Google Sheet, ezTrans, DeepL) â€¢ Language Patch with using DB
ðŸ“– Summary: MORT is a real-time game translator that extracts dialog from the screen using OCR and provides translations via machine translation services or a database. It supports multiple OCR engines and translation providers, allowing users to customize the translation process. The program is designed to help users understand foreign language games by providing instant translations of in-game text.
